name: Travel + Leisure Co.
description: Travel + Leisure Co. is a leading global leisure travel company, providing a wide range of experiences and services to travelers around the world. Established as a separate entity in 2021, the company focuses on enhancing the travel experience through its portfolio of vacation ownership, resort, and travel-related businesses. Travel + Leisure Co. operates well-known brands such as Wyndham Destinations and the Travel + Leisure magazine, which offers travel inspiration, insights, and tips to millions of readers. The company prides itself on customer satisfaction, offering high-quality accommodations, diverse travel options, and exceptional service. Its vacation ownership segment allows members to enjoy timeshare properties in desirable locations, while its hospitality division manages resorts and hotels that cater to both leisure and business travelers. As part of its commitment to sustainability, Travel + Leisure Co. is dedicated to promoting responsible tourism practices and supporting local communities. The company continuously seeks to innovate and adapt to changing travel trends, ensuring that it meets the evolving needs of its customers. With a mission to inspire and empower travelers, Travel + Leisure Co. is positioned as a trusted partner in creating unforgettable travel experiences.

seo.meta_title: Travel + Leisure Co. | Leisure Travel Experiences
seo.meta_description: Explore Travel + Leisure Co., a leader in leisure travel offering vacation ownership, resorts, and travel inspiration. Discover unforgettable experiences with us.

faq.question: What does Travel + Leisure Co. do?
faq.answer: Travel + Leisure Co. is a leisure travel company that provides vacation ownership, resorts, and travel-related services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Travel + Leisure Co.?
faq.answer: Geoffrey A. Ballotti is the CEO of Travel + Leisure Co.

faq.question: Where is Travel + Leisure Co. headquartered?
faq.answer: Travel + Leisure Co. is headquartered in Orlando, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Travel + Leisure Co. offer?
faq.answer: The company offers vacation ownership, resorts, and travel inspiration through its magazine.

faq.question: When was Travel + Leisure Co. founded?
faq.answer: Travel + Leisure Co. was founded in 2021.
